any data for free Search by movie name, cast, year of release.. Logout? This will remove all your downloads from the device.
The Mishtu Movie Booth App would like to collect and use the following information: 
		•	Phone Model 
		•	Phone Device Id 
		•	OS version 

The app would also capture the following events with timestamps: 
		•	App installation/ uninstall 
		•	User login/ logout 
		•	Language selected 
		•	App started/ closed 
		•	Hub connected/ disconnected 
		•	Download/ delete movie 
		•	Play/pause movie 
		•	Movie download time 
		•	Generation of voucher code 

The Mishtu Movie Booth app does not store any personal identifiers, and all data that is collected is fully anonymized. This is a limited duration research project and the data collected is to primarily understand and improve user experience. Read more in our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. 

Accepting these permissions means that you give consent to this app to use data as specified above. You can review the terms of use and consent in the app Settings and may choose to logout/ uninstall the app at any time.
